name: Death Machine
description:
My first multiplayer game.
I'm using abstract class and interface in this game with pun2.  Actually i want to add camera shaker for pc version but i didn't. Maybe i do mobile version.  Let's talk about game. 

If you want to see players in your game you have to click " TAB " button.

If you want to chat another players you have to click " Y " button then chat menu will be active.

If you want to quit or go lobby scene you have to click " ESC " button.
